EmailTemplate.description: FFN or LFCCP No Show Spanish
EmailTemplate.name: FFN / LFCCP / Training No Show (Spanish)
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Estimado {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
De acuerdo con nuestros registros, usted no asistió a la capacitación {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} en {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c}. Por favor visite https://imaginewa.org/training/ si desea registrarse para una clase diferente.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
